item.title: 【HD Live Performances】WEB-DL - Mary J Blige at the BBC (2023) 1080p iPLAYER WEB-DL AAC2.0 H.264-MELODiE [CC]
item.description:
Mary J Blige at the BBC (2023) 1080p iPLAYER WEB-DL AAC2.0 H.264-MELODiE [CC]​

A celebration of R&B superstar Mary J Blige that spans the highlights of her groundbreaking career and features the very best of her appearances on a selection of BBC shows.

From the early songs of the mid-1990s right up to her acclaimed 2015 performance on Glastonbury’s Pyramid Stage, this collection demonstrates why Mary has been labelled as ‘the queen of hip-hop soul’, featuring such hits as Just Fine, Everything and No More Drama.

The programme also includes her collaborations with U2, George Michael and the man who once said Mary possesses 'one of the best voices you’re ever going to hear', Sir Elton John.​
